title: 91x21: Deferred Law Associates and 18 U.S.C. §§ 208 and 209
summary: Graduates who accept employment with the Federal Government during the period of their deferral from employment with private law firms have an agreement concerning prospective employment for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 208. The deferral payments the graduates receive would not be made to compensate them for services as Federal employees.
